meanings.sent1: The breakfasters enjoyed their morning meal.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the breakfasters gather to eat.
meanings.sent3: The breakfasters chuckled as they shared stories over cereal.
meanings.sent4: The breakfasters were a flock of early birds, chirping over their plates.
meanings.sent5: The image of the breakfasters happily munching on toast stayed with me all day.

meanings.definition: A group of people who eat breakfast together.
meanings.sent1: The family of breakfasters sat around the table, chatting and eating.
meanings.sent2: The breakfasters at the cafe ordered pancakes and coffee.
meanings.sent3: The breakfasters at the office potluck brought in a variety of dishes.
meanings.sent4: The breakfasters resembled a pack of wolves devouring their morning feast.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the breakfasters sharing a meal warmed my heart.
